N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.4 - Payroll records

State Regulations
(a) On behalf
of the fund, the fiscal officer shall maintain and make available for
inspection and copying at the fund's office a current list setting forth the
name, public office address, title and salary of every officer or employee of
the fund. (b) All requests to
inspect and/or copy the payroll record of the fund shall be made to the fiscal
officer. Such request shall be made either orally or in writing; provided, however, that the fiscal officer may require the applicant to confirm his
request in writing on a form prescribed by the Comptroller of the State of New

York. (c) Upon receipt of an
application to inspect the payroll record of the fund, on the proper form and
at the appropriate time, the fiscal officer shall promptly search for and
produce for inspection the same and he shall either permit the applicant making
the request to copy the payroll record or, upon payment of the established fee, make a copy of the record for him. (d) The fiscal officer shall respond promptly
to a request for the payroll record and his response shall be made no more than
five workdays after receipt of the request for inspection. Notes
